appearances.title: Washington Journal 01/01/2026 : CSPAN : January 1, 2026 6:59am-10:03am EST
appearances.snippet: i'm concerned that congressional members at josh riley do not listen to someone like myself who has writtenn amendment to the affordable care act and we have long-term beneficial financial stability for 22 million americans. even your show could have me on to explain and there will be people who would support my men meant. host: what is the elevator pitch on the amendment? caller: for decades, insurance companies have petition states for insurance premium hikes and it is not the federal government that does this. it is the states like new york state. it is the department of financial services. they proven almost every year and what we need to do, like the student loan program has caused colleges to say we are just going to raise rates for tuition because you are going to pay the extra amount in student loans, they keep doing that so i want my men meant would cause congress to take over the process of regulating premiums, premium levels for health care insurance premiums and we would dial it back to mid 2018 premiums, which would save people money and we would have a temporary, six-month sub
